lines.text:
[On the phone]
We hit pay dirt. The gal in question is Yvonne LeDoux, a bur-le-q queen workin' out of the Bijou Theater, but that's not all. She's also the widow of the late Benny McBride'
You should see her workin' clothes Imagine a dish like this married to a mug like Benny McBride... the naked and the dead.

[Upset that he's going to shoot the fallen policeman a second time]
Dave, stop it, please!

[Coldly, as he draws a bead on him]
No loose ends, Baby!
If anything goes wrong, I'll call yuh.
Yeah, tonight. The Valley Motor Court... Sunset 7-2131. I'm registered under the name of Martin Bell.

[Seeing bnny start to write the number down on a matchbook]
Don't write that down!
I don't wanna forget it. You move so often.
I don't like things written down! I don't like it! Memorize it! Sunset 7 - 2131!

[sarcastically as he sniffs a dry tumbler sitting on the mantle]
Aged in the glass bourbon!
